page.title: 19MY LIFE ON MONDAYS
page.content: At 7.00 a.m. on every Monday in school time,I have my breakfast of muesli, toast and coffee and watch "Popeye" on TV AM.After breakfast mummy tidies my hair and drives me to school before 9.00 a.m.At school I put my lunch-box in the cloakroom and my teacher calls the register in the classroom. We go into the hall with Class 3 for an assembly by our head and come back to work at handwriting,language work and mathematics, in groups.We stop at 10.35 for a play outside if it is not raining.At 10.55 we write stories and at 12.00 it is lunch-time and we play until 1.15 p.m.In Summer we have a swimming lesson at 1.15 until 2.00 p.m. I find information from books and write facts about my termly topic.I go home at 3.15 p.m.,play tennis outside until 5.00 p.m. I read,have tea and go to bed at 7.30 p.m. by Michelle
